images.copyright: Hyacinth macaws in the Pantanal region of Brazil (© David Pattyn/Minden Pictures)
images.title: What's better than a smile?
images.caption: What's better than a smile?
images.desc: How about two smiles? Some would say there's plenty to be glum about these days, but to help you grin and bear it, we're sharing this pic of a pair of hyacinth macaws in Brazil's Pantanal region as they say 'cheese' for the camera.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
